original_text: The Sabbath of the land shall provide food for you, for yourself and for your male and female slaves and for your hired worker and the sojourner who lives with you,
korean_text: 안식년의 소출은 너희가 먹을 것이니 너와 네 남종과 네 여종과 네 품꾼과 너와 함께 거류하는 자들과

sentences.original_text: The Sabbath of the land shall provide food for you
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 안식일이 너희에게 음식을 공급할 것이니

sentences.original_text: and for your male and female slaves
and for the sojourner who lives with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너와 함께 사는 나그네를 위하여
